span.style: border: 1px solid rgb(129, 129, 81); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 225); font-size: x-small; white-space: nowrap; padding:0px 2px;

dl.dd: If true, the textbox will be filled in with the best match when it loses the focus. If false, it will only be filled in when the user selects an item.
